channel.title: Finance
channel.description: Latest investing news and finance headlines straight from Wall Street.

item.title: PayPal stumbles 6% after missing on revenue, slashing full-year outlook
item.description: Shares of PayPal fell as much in after-hours trading after the company lowered its full-year guidance.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Facebook, Tesla, Ford, PayPal and more
item.description: See which stocks are posting big moves after the bell.

item.title: The Fed is leading a global push to lower rates, and Europe is getting ready to follow suit
item.description: The European Central Bank on Thursday is expected to weigh lowering its already-negative interest rate.

item.title: Betterment faces questions from regulator after launching checking and savings accounts
item.description: Betterment is answering questions from one of its regulators after launching a bank-like deposit product.

item.title: Market analyst ponders whether we've hit 'peak FANG, peak Pot, peak millennials'
item.description: One strategist thinks this bull market could end as focus shifts away from millennials and onto Gen Z.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Boeing, Texas Instruments, iRobot, Caterpillar & more
item.description: Names on the move ahead of the open.

item.title: Based on what people are searching for on Google, a recession is nowhere near
item.description: Search volumes for terms that were leading indicators of the Great Recession are down significantly.

item.title: Texas Instruments leads chip stocks to record highs, a surprising move given trade war fears
item.description: Semiconductor stocks surged to record highs Wednesday, boosted by a jump in Texas Instruments and Teradyne shares on blowout earnings.

item.title: Evercore ISI: Apple is 'well positioned to continue to surprise investors on the upside'
item.description: After Apple's 30% surge this year so far, the tech giant still has room to run with the upcoming earnings release likely to push the stock higher, Evercore ISI said.

item.title: The Fed will disappoint the market and push stocks off record highs, Blackstone's Joseph Zidle warns
item.description: Blackstone's Joseph Zidle believes trouble is lurking in the stock market.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Boeing, Caterpillar, AT&T, UPS, Anthem, Snap & more
item.description: Names on the move ahead of the open.

item.title: Credit Suisse cuts Amazon estimates a day before earnings report, citing one-day shipping costs
item.description: Credit Suisse lowered Amazon's full-year earnings per share estimate as it expects the company to apply the one-day shipping on a large number of products.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Facebook, Amazon, Snap, Chipotle, iRobot and more
item.description: See which stocks are posting big moves after the bell.

item.title: The trade war is killing the maker of the Roomba
item.description: Shares of iRobot plummeted after the company's top executive said tariffs from the conflict will weigh on the company's numbers throughout 2019.

item.title: The Fed has three options. Here's the difference between them, and why anything could happen
item.description: Policymakers either can choose to hold interest rates steady, cut by a quarter point or cut by half a point. Raising rates isn't an option.

item.title: Technology stocks rise to their highest levels ever despite the trade war
item.description: Big cap technology stocks hit a new all-time high Tuesday, aided by a rebounding semiconductor sector.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Coca-Cola, Biogen, Sherwin-Williams, Travelers & more
item.description: Names on the move ahead of the open.

item.title: Online wealth advisor Betterment launches checking and savings accounts
item.description: Betterment debuts a checking and savings account with a 2.69% yield, and a debit card.

item.title: Cryptocurrency investor's $224 million suit against AT&T over stolen coins moves forward
item.description: A cryptocurrency investor's $224 million suit against AT&T over stolen coins is allowed to move forward

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein appeals bail denial decision in child sex trafficking case
item.description: The move Monday came four days after Judge Richard Berman rejected Epstein's bid to to be released on a bond of up to $100 million.

item.title: Morgan Stanley: Disney's earnings will nearly double in 4 years
item.description: Disney can nearly double its earnings by 2024, Morgan Stanley said in a note to clients on Tuesday.

item.title: Trade war coming down to US easing up on Huawei and China buying agricultural products
item.description: Olive branches were extended from both China and the U.S. as the two nations are set to restart face-to-face trade negotiations after a monthlong truce.

item.title: IMF lowers its global economic growth forecast again as risks remain to the 'downside'
item.description: The IMF trims its economic growth forecast again as the U.S.-China trade war continues, Brexit worries linger and inflation remains muted.

item.title: Your first trade for Tuesday, July 23
item.description: The "Fast Money" traders share their first moves for the market open.

item.title: A big buying opportunity is unfolding in the market, Wall Street bull Tony Dwyer says
item.description: Canaccord Genuity's Tony Dwyer believes stocks are about to fall as much as 5% from their all-time highs.

item.title: Snap shares jump on upgrade ahead of earnings after the bell
item.description: Shares of Snap, parent company of Snapchat, rose Tuesday following an upgrade from Stifel ahead of the company's earnings release after the bell.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Coca-Cola, Travelers, Biogen, Hasbro & more
item.description: Names on the move ahead of the open.

item.title: Pakistan's prime minister visits Trump, but that's not likely to help his country's economy
item.description: Michael Kugelman from the U.S.-based Wilson Center says other issues take precedence in the bilateral dialogue between the United States and Pakistan — namely, Afghanistan and counter-terrorism.

item.title: Trump talking about crypto can only be a good thing, CEO of top exchange Binance says
item.description: President Donald Trump might not be a fan of cryptocurrencies, but Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao doesn't seem worried.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: TD Ameritrade, Whirlpool and more
item.description: See which stocks are posting big moves after the bell.
